desc.value: Complete missions in [Atreides-adjective] territories until you can take [PlainsOfArrakeen].
Complete missions in [Harkonnen-adjective] territories until you can take [CarthagsRift].
Complete missions in [Corrino-adjective] territories until you can take [EmperorsLanding].
Complete missions in [Ecaz-adjective] territories until you can take [ForestHeart].
Complete missions in [Vernius-adjective] territories until you can take [IxianConvergence].
Complete missions in a Great House territory until you can take their capital.
Complete missions that give you Sovereignty over territories to expand.
Use [CQ_ImprovementPoint]s to build Improvements on your territories.
Complete missions that defend or free a territory with a [Bonus_SpiceField] to disrupt the [Spice] trade.
Ally [Sietch]s and complete secondary objectives to increase your relationship with the [!Fremen].
Purge hostile [Sietch]s and complete secondary objectives to unite the [!Fremen] behind your cause.
Launch [CB_MFraufrelucheBribe] on Great Houses and complete secondary objectives to infiltrate the Faufreluches system.
